level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 232(e) of Fiscal Year 2004 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2003 (D.C. Act 15-105, June 20, 2003, 50 DCR 5613).
For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 232(e) of Fiscal Year 2004 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2003 (D.C. Act 15-149, September 22, 2003, 50 DCR 8360).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 2-148
level.text: Law 2-148, the "District of Columbia Redevelopment Land Agency Tax Exemption Act of 1978," was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 2-386, which was referred to the Committee on Housing and Urban Development. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 28, 1978, and December 12, 1978, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 29, 1978, it was assigned Act No. 2-327 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
